thread.title: Customer in Luton
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer in Luton

author: Customer in Luton
title: Customer in Luton
text: It was a freezing morning when Josh came to change my tyres at my home. He advised me to stay in doors while he changed the tyres. He also advised me that a third tyre needs changing in about a month's time. Tyres were the cheapest I have ever bought and the bonus was I was getting it done at home. Driven the car about today and no issues.
